post.author: Chris An
post.content:
By all means, go ahead.  There must be more and better opportunities in US.  Good luck!

>I am working for Canada company in Toronto.
>By the way, I got a  job offer from US job agency.
>H1 visa is in process.
>
>I am wondering if I move to US or stay in Toronto.
>I am thinking US experince gives me more. But I am not sure.
>
post.title: [re] help me ! help me!!
